commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Morning. What time is it?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Morning. It's just past noon.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's already noon?! Aww, and I'm the last person awake. Someone should've woken me up.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: You worked the hardest out of all of us, so you can sleep as much as you want.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Sleep as much as you want... Such beautiful words!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I bought some rice balls and sandwiches, so take your pick and have some!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thanks for the food. But how about we upload that video before we eat?

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Oh, a-already? I'm getting nervous now.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I wonder if people will watch it?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I'm sure they will. What's really important is how they'll react.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm so nervous...

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: It'll be fine! The promo video is a masterpiece! Everyone agreed it was awesome, right?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: You're right. I am sure our feelings will be clear to everyone who watches our video.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Yeah, I think so too.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: All right, are we ready then? Aaaand... Done!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: What are the comments saying, zura?!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Ahaha, we literally JUST uploaded it! Give it some time!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Oh... Now I'm starting to get nervous. Could I have a rice ball to help calm me down?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Haha, here. Help yourself.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: I know in my heart that it'll be okay, but I'm still nervous about it.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I think I feel more nervous now than I do before a live show...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Come on, get a hold of yourselves! Whatever happens, happens!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I know, I know, but still...

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Oh! There's a comment! Huh? What's happening? The comments section is blowing up!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Whoa, whoa! The site can't keep up with all the comments appearing!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Wh-What do they say?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Let's see... "What a great promo video." "Watching the video got me all excited." "It looks like so much fun!" "I'm definitely going!"

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: All of the other messages are cheering us on. They're all really positive!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yay! It's a hit!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: I knew they'd love it!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Wow... More and more comments just keep flooding in. There's just no end to them.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Hey, we're also getting lots of emails coming through as well, you know?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Whoa, you're right. Let's see...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: "I'm a school idol as well. It's my dream to make an appearance at the School Idol Festival and perform live on stage!"

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: We're getting e-mails from other school idols who want to participate one after another.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: This is pretty much the best outcome we could've asked for, huh?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: It's the bestest best outcome! Now I know we can do it... Our event is totally gonna be a success!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I can feel our dream becoming a reality.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Come Together, Dream Together... This is exactly what we're seeing right now.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yeah! We're gonna make those dreams come true! Starting here and now!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Come Together, Dream Together!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Let's Make Our Dreams Come True, Together!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: G-Guys! Listen up! A classmate of mine called me over when I came into class today! She said our event looks like fun!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Everyone was talking to us about it when Emma and I got back to the dorms yesterday too.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah! Everyone was cheering us on and telling us they were definitely going!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I also received acclaim about the song. When I told people it was written by Riko of Aqours everyone was full of praise for her usual songwriting talents.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: People had a lot to say about the footage too! They can definitely see just how hard we're working!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: There were people who said they had it on loop, and I was, like, totally flattered!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I had people telling me they want to help out.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, yeah! Me too. They figured we'd need help.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Ah, I can truly feel the love for school idols spreading across Japan!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, I couldn't agree more. The number of views and comments keeps on rising and our inbox is jam-packed with emails ever since we uploaded the video.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Even that stubborn Shioriko Mifune has to see how crazy it is to tell us to stop now! Right?!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: If she comes at us again, we'll silence her ourselves!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Wow, Karin... That's pretty intense.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Why don't any of them get it? If they just followed my plans as instructed, it would lead them to success and it would be useful to them in their future endeavors.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: And yet they still want to go about their ways despite knowing how useless their actions may be. It doesn't make any sense.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Reality will come crashing down on you if you continue to follow a dream incompatible with your talents.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Dreams don't come true. You wake up from them and are dragged back to reality. I know this.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: That's all it is... I'm just trying to help them discover happiness in what is real. So why won't they...?
